::Bloodystrike::

Bloodystrike looks in awe at Skulletron, shielding his head as pieces of the 
bot fly past him. "Wow," he says, "Not half bad! That power of yours could 
come in useful!"

He walks into the center of the room, "But lets see how you do against a real 
opponent, one who doesn't always listen to his emotions!"

Bloodystrike takes out his sword. "You can make the first move," he says, 
waiting for Skulletron to attack.
